You don’t need any special medical equipment to get your pulse and to keep track of your health state, just your phone camera! Most accurate, fast and easy to use heart rate app.
 
APPLIED METHOD:

Our app is based on photoplethysmography (PPG), non-invasive optical technique. Each heart beat transmits the amount of blood to the tissues in your fingers, while the blood absorbs your camera’s light, it illuminates the skin and captures microvascular blood volume changes such as ebb and flow. That allows you to measure the pulse easily, accurately and efficiently.
 
HOW TO USE:

Cover the camera lens and flashlight with your fingertip completely. Do not press too intensively in order to avoid reducing blood flow. Hold your phone steady and keep still. Make sure your fingers are not cold. Press the button and get your results.
 
TRACK YOUR MEASUREMENTS:

summary.label:
Fasting is pretty simple way to lose weight and improve health.

Intermittent fasting is one of the famous methods which was proven to be effective. After certain amount of time during fasting diet your body starts to use energy from fat cells. The process is called ketosis. This means that you start lose weight and burn fat. First weeks with the fasting type will show great results for most people, around 10% of total body weight might be lost. 

Is it good for health?

By many recent studies intermittent fasting is considered the healthiest and the safest way to lose weight fast. Modern way to eat - multiple meals per day may cause some of the diseases: diabetes, cancer etc. Usually with interval fasting you will reduce number of meals per day.

In our fasting app we have two ways to control your fast periods:

Instant fasting

It's mostly Intermittent fasting plans with different length and start/end time. Different levels from beginners to advanced. Customizable interval fasts. You also can create custom fasting times.

Scheduled fasting plans

Autopilot plans with different length, mostly week plans. It's fully automated and prepared for you. You will be notified when to start and finish your fasting period. For beginners we have 1 day per week scheduled plans, for advanced it could vary on your needs from 3 fasting days per week and more.

Learn

Information about advantages and disadvantages of fasting diet, healthy living and more is available in our blog! Check out fasting stages that your body reaches during fasts.

1) Sugar increasing 
2) Blood Sugar dropping
3) Sugar normalization
4) Fat burn
5) Autophagy
6) Growth hormone

We have tracker to monitor these values and current stage. You will see how much time you've spent burning fat and in autophagy phase.

No food restrictions during the feast period. While fasting, you can eat foods and drinks with zero calories.

Stevy is free fasting app with different plans. Our tracker will help you to boost your weight loss diet and healthy life.

Plans

• 16:8 Intermittent Fast, or 16-HOUR FAST it's the most popular fasting period to start with
• 18:6 Intermittent Fast, or 18-HOUR FAST, is a little harder but still very flexible, you can have 2 meals per day
• CIRCADIAN RHYTHM FAST - 13-hour fast starts at sunset to align your fast and eating window with your body’s natural clock

Analysis

In analysis tab you can see your progress for last week, quarter, year. Also you can track how many hours you fasted during these periods of time with detailed statistics.

Features of the intermittent fasting tracker:
• Large list of fasting plans
• Track your fasting time with timer
• Schedule intervals
• Analysis and calendar view
• Easy to lose weight
• Body stages during intermittent fasting
• Change start / end time
• Fasting notifications and reminders
• Create custom fasting plans
• Knowledge database
• Fasting quiz

Benefits of intermittent fasting:

• REGENERATION
When you fasting, your body generates new young cells to replace old died ones.

• LOSE WEIGHT
Apply this for a certain number of hours each day or eating just one meal a couple days a week, can help your body burn fat.

• GROWTH HORMONE
Fasting helps regulate various processes such as muscle growth, sugar and fluid levels in the body, metabolism, and more.

• INSULIN
Insulin levels decreased by 16% in the group that practiced calorie restriction.

• LIFE EXTEND
Gene expression is the process by which DNA directs the synthesis of functional products such as proteins. Cells can regulate gene expression at various stages. This process affects the life expectancy and health of the body.

• METABOLISM
Skipping meals will run your body to adapt by lowering its metabolic rate to save energy. This process can actually increase your metabolism.

• HEART
Intermittent fasting might help improve cholesterol level, high blood pressure, and other

Unlock the power of intermittent fasting to reach your goal weight and get healthy. No diet and no yo-yo effect. Improve your metabolic health  and feel full of energy.

What is intermittent fasting?
Intermittent fasting is one of the most popular health and fitness trends. Instead of a diet, it's an eating pattern that cycles between periods of fasting and eating. It doesn't specify which foods you should eat or avoid, but when you should eat.
Today, we eat 3–4 (or more) meals per day, and never feel hungry. This requires our organs to work hard all the time, and never take a break from digesting. Our eating habits may result in obesity and health problems, such as diabetes.
When fasting, your body will detoxify, burn fat and regenerate. After a few weeks, you'll feel healthier and more active. 

Gradual fasting plans, suitable for all! 
Create your own fasting plan 13-11, 15-9, 16-10, 16-8, 18-6, 20-4, 23-1, 24, 36, 48, Custom
5+2 Weekly Plan : During the week, eat normally for 5 days, and choose another 2 days for a little control.Women take 500Kcal and men take 600Kcal on fasting days. You can choose to take it all at once, but a better choice is to divide 600Kcal into two meals, 250Kcal for breakfast and 350Kcal for dinner. The food should preferably be some food with high protein content but low glycemic index (GI). It is not recommended to completely eliminate carbohydrates. When eating, chew slowly and savor well. The fasting days need to be separated, such as Monday and Thursday. This light fasting plan is healthy, effective and easy to implement, allowing you to lose weight easily while enjoying the other benefits of fasting. It can be performed long-term, gradually turning it into a healthy lifestyle.
16-8 is the most popular fasting plan for weight loss. With 16 hours fasting period, your body will gradually get used to fasting.
